## R user groups and forums ```{r, fig.align = 'center',out.width= '20%', echo=FALSE } knitr::include_graphics(path = "figures/internet.png", auto_pdf = TRUE) ``` - - - ##Workshop files {#workshopfiles} ### Chapter 7 files ```{r echo=FALSE} library(downloadthis) download_link( link="https://m-gemmell.github.io/R_for_everyone/downloads/Liverpool_beaches.csv", button_label = "Download Liverpool beaches csv file", button_type = "danger", has_icon = TRUE, icon = "fa fa-save", self_contained = TRUE ) ```

## Base R books and links **Quick-R**: **R Cookbook**: ## R cheat sheets ## Advanced R topics **R packages**: **Efficient R Programming**: **R for Data Science**: **R Graphics Cookbook**: **Fundamentals of Data Visualization**: **R BOOKDOWN** (used to make this book): **Hands-On Programming with R**: **Efficient R programming**: ## Datasets I got a lot of my datasets from [Kaggle](https://www.kaggle.com/)
